verses.verse: Moreover, the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it,

and say <S%H559><s%> to it, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you, Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> And I will stretch <S%H5186><s%> out My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, And I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and a waste. <S%H4923><s%>

"I will lay <S%H7760><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%> your cities, <S%H5892><s%> And you will become <S%H1961><s%> a desolation. <S%H8077><s%> Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Because <S%H3282><s%> you have had <S%H1961><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%> enmity <S%H342><s%> and have delivered <S%H5064><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to the power <S%H3027><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of their calamity, <S%H343><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of the end, <S%H7093><s%>

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will give <S%H6213><s%> you over <S%H6213><s%> to bloodshed, <S%H1818><s%> and bloodshed <S%H1818><s%> will pursue <S%H7291><s%> you; since <S%H518><s%> you have not hated <S%H8130><s%> bloodshed, <S%H1818><s%> therefore bloodshed <S%H1818><s%> will pursue <S%H7291><s%> you.

"And I will make <S%H5414><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> a waste <S%H8077><s%> and a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> and I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> from it the one who passes <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> and returns. <S%H7725><s%>

"And I will fill <S%H4390><s%> its mountains <S%H2022><s%> with its slain; <S%H2491><s%> on your hills <S%H1389><s%> and in your valleys <S%H1516><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> your ravines <S%H650><s%> those slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> will fall. <S%H5307><s%>

"I will make <S%H5414><s%> you an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> desolation, <S%H8077><s%> and your cities <S%H5892><s%> will not be inhabited. <S%H3427><s%> Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Because <S%H3282><s%> you have said, <S%H559><s%> 'These two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and these two <S%H8147><s%> lands <S%H776><s%> will be mine, and we will possess <S%H3423><s%> them,' although the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was there, <S%H8033><s%>

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will deal <S%H6213><s%> [with you] according to your anger <S%H639><s%> and according to your envy <S%H7068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you showed <S%H6213><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of your hatred <S%H8135><s%> against them; so I will make <S%H3045><s%> Myself known <S%H3045><s%> among them when <S%H9201><s%> I judge <S%H8199><s%> you.

"Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your revilings <S%H9308><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have spoken <S%H559><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'They are laid <S%H8074><s%> desolate; <S%H8074><s%> they are given <S%H5414><s%> to us for food. <S%H402><s%>'

"And you have spoken <S%H1431><s%> <S%H6310><s%> arrogantly <S%H1431><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Me and have multiplied <S%H6280><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Me; I have heard. <S%H8085><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "As all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoices, <S%H8055><s%> I will make <S%H6213><s%> you a desolation. <S%H8077><s%>

"As you rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> over the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> it was desolate, <S%H8074><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> to you. You will be a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> O Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Edom, <S%H9000><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of it. Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"'
